story.english: Sarah woke up early on a Saturday morning. The sun was shining, and she decided to go for a run. She put on her running shoes and headed to the park. As she jogged along the trail, she saw a friendly dog playing with a ball. Sarah stopped to pet the dog and threw the ball for him. They played for a while before she continued her run. After her workout, Sarah went to a cafe for a cup of coffee and enjoyed the rest of the day.
story.portuguese: Sarah acordou cedo em uma manhã de sábado. O sol estava brilhando, e ela decidiu sair para correr. Ela calçou seus tênis de corrida e foi para o parque. Enquanto corria pela trilha, ela viu um cachorro amigável brincando com uma bola. Sarah parou para acariciar o cachorro e jogou a bola para ele. Eles brincaram por um tempo antes de Sarah continuar sua corrida. Depois do treino, Sarah foi a um café para tomar uma xícara de café e aproveitou o resto do dia.

questions.questionEn: What did Sarah do after her run?
questions.questionTranslation: O que Sarah fez depois da corrida?
answers: She went shopping at the mall.
She returned home and went to bed.
She went to a cafe for coffee.
questions.correctAnswer: She went to a cafe for coffee.

questions.questionEn: Why did Sarah stop during her run?
questions.questionTranslation: Por que Sarah parou durante sua corrida?
answers: She was tired and needed a break.
She wanted to take a nap in the park.
She saw a squirrel in a tree.
She needed to tie her shoelaces.
She wanted to pet a friendly dog.
questions.correctAnswer: She wanted to pet a friendly dog.

questions.questionEn: What was the weather like when Sarah woke up?
questions.questionTranslation: Como estava o tempo quando Sarah acordou?
